name: botbuilder-choices
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Microsoft BotBuilder tools for working with choices.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-choices --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder-choices .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - Choices" --readme none
